LanguageData.Balalaika.label: balalaika
LanguageData.Balalaika.description: A plucked musical instrument, usually having a triangular body and three strings
LanguageData.Banjo.label: banjo
LanguageData.Banjo.description: A banjo is a musical instrument that looks like a guitar with a circular body, a long neck, and four or more strings.
LanguageData.BassGuitar.label: bass guitar
LanguageData.BassGuitar.description: A guitar that has the same pitch and tuning as a double bass, usually electrically amplified
LanguageData.Cello.label: cello
LanguageData.Cello.description: A cello is a musical instrument with four strings that looks like a large violin.
LanguageData.Contrabass.label: contrabass
LanguageData.Contrabass.description: A contrabass is the largest instrument in the violin family.
LanguageData.Guitar.label: guitar
LanguageData.Guitar.description: A six-stringed instrument played by picking or strumming. Great for entertaining groups around a campfire.
LanguageData.Violin.label: violin
LanguageData.Violin.description: A four-stringed instrument played with a bow, synonymous with the virtuosos of Old Earth.
